category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: Foodstuffs for human and animal consumption, live animals, seeds, plants, additives normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs. Excl. beverages and water, this does not apply to selected drinks (milk and liquid milk products, plant-based milk alternatives, even if they contain added sugar or other sweetener, additive or other food, provided they retain the essential character of such beverages).

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

Restaurant and catering services except serving beverages other than drinking water and selected drinks; serving drinking water and selected drinks. 
Selected drinks (non-alcoholic beverage) are milk and liquid milk products, plant-based milk alternatives (CN 2202 99 11 and 2202 99 15), even if they contain added sugar or other sweetening matter, additive or other food, provided they retain the essential character of such beverages.

Repair or modification of such medical equipment.
